Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2013 12:33PM Nikstar wrote: Hello,  I'm scheduled for a left breast surgery on March 15th.  I am in NYC.  I would love to connect with other women going through the same thing.  I'm out-of-my mind with worry, concerns, fears, anxiety - you name it. Nik
